text:
Possible problem with suexec, noticed that if you have a script that is set to 
suid of owner you can't run it in apache, noticed that the docs didn't say 
anything about this so felt maybe you should either mention it or get scripts 
which are suided to owner to work with suexec.  Thanx.  Apologize if you've 
been bugged about this already but i didn't see this problem mentioned 
anywhere.
creator: drturgeon@hotmail.com
